AUTHOR: Adargi
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing the Remastered Edition of Kowlin's Antilink
This cog will block any invite link that isn't send by a mod/admin

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://yrhenogledd.space/Gallafant/wiki>)
For support: <https://discord.gg/xZsSxXp>

If you like my work and want to support me then please share this with your friends
NAME: AntiLink
SHORT: Automaticly remove Discord invite links from users & unauthorised chat messages (Non admin)(or selected player/rank)
